synopsis.text:
Izumi's dreams of becoming the student council president at Seifuu High School are shattered when he is defeated by the enchanting Ui Wakana, who captivates the student body with her bold promises of promoting romantic freedom and distributing contraceptives. Reluctantly, Izumi accepts the role of vice president, only to find out that his rival is now his fianc√©e, thanks to a drunken pact made by their parents years ago.

As they navigate the challenges of maintaining a secret marriage and managing the student council, Izumi and Ui must learn to live together while keeping their relationship hidden from their conservative peers. With Ui's vivacious personality winning over the hearts of the other council members, Izumi struggles to maintain order and balance his newfound domestic life.

Can Izumi and Ui successfully keep their unusual living arrangement under wraps, all while managing the student council and finding happiness in their unexpected marriage? Join them in Okusama ga Seitokaichou! to discover the answer to this unconventional love story.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
